profileAlternative.name: Anupam Godbole
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer - Lead
profileAlternative.summary:
1. 9+ years of professional experience designing and developing multiple iPhone/iPad apps and an overall experience of 12 years in software development.
2. Designed and developed two self-started Apps for iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad available in Apple App Store by the names “TV Schedules” and “Delivery Tracker”.
3. 3 years of professional experience in web portal designing, development and maintenance of Windows Application development in C, C++, C#, ASP.NET.

aboutAlternative.text:
1. 9+ years of professional experience designing and developing multiple iPhone/iPad apps and an overall experience of 12 years in software development.
2. Designed and developed two self-started Apps for iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad available in Apple App Store by the names “TV Schedules” and “Delivery Tracker”.
3. 3 years of professional experience in web portal designing, development and maintenance of Windows Application development in C, C++, C#, ASP.NET.

positions.title:
Title
Lead iOS Developer - SoundHound app
Senior Software Design Engineer - iOS
positions.description:
* Responsible for suggesting best practices for iOS apps, implementing new features and fixing bugs in the Self Aware games' flagship game "Casino".
* Responsible for creating test builds for QA using TestFlight as well as submitting and releasing the app to Apple App Store.
* Partly involved in fixing bugs on the server side.
…
see more

positions.title: Mobile Application Developer
positions.description:
1. GoMeals/GoMeals HD (Available in Apple App Store)
* Designed and developed an app that helps iPhone/iPad users to keep a track of the daily calorie intake and displays the trend in the form of bar graphs.
* Coordinated with design team, product lead and test team to get the project done.
* Used CoreGraphics, QuartzCore to render the bar graphs and CoreLocation to search near by restaurants.
Frameworks Used: QuartzCore, CoreGraphics, CoreAnimation, CoreLocation

2. PDF Viewer
* Designed and developed an iPad app that displays PDF pages and also supports zoom in/out functionality and displaying notes.
* Involved using NSOperationQueue and threads to prefetch PDF pages.
* Used Instruments to fine-tune the performance by identifying memory leaks/allocations.
Frameworks Used: CoreGraphics

3. FactorTrack (Available in App Store)
* Developed an iPad app that helps hemophilia patients to maintain infusion records and to schedule future infusions.
* Used CoreData to maintain the records and local notifications to receive alert for future scheduled infusions.
Frameworks Used: CoreData, QuartzCore, CoreGraphics
…
see more

positions.title: Research Assistant
positions.description:
Plant Diagnostic Information System (PDIS)
1. The research work involves designing, development and maintenance of PDIS web portal, which has been developed to facilitate plant diagnostic lab activities.
2. Used advanced features of ASP.NET 2.0 like User profile creation, maintaining their roles and customization of GUI per user.
3. Used AJAX to provide a better user experience and to increase the performance of the web site.
Technologies used: ASP.NET 2.0, C# 2.0, OLEDB with Oracle 10g, Telerik ASP.NET AJAX Controls, JavaScript
…
see more

positions.title: Software Developer
positions.description:
Continuous Data Protection
1. Worked on Continuous Data Protection project that involved designing and developing file-system mini-filter driver that continuously takes backup of changes made to the files. The driver intercepts each read/write request, processes it and saves relevant data to files on the disk. It was developed in C and C++ using Windows Driver Development Kit (WinDDK).
2. Designed and developed a user-space Win32 application to rollback the changes made by a particular process. The user interface and the business logic were developed in Visual C++.

Technologies used: C, C++, Windows Driver Development Kit (WinDDK), MFC.
…
see more
